word_mean: 叶：任何器官内，比较界限分明的部分，特指脑、肺及腺体。叶是由裂隙、沟、结缔组织及其形状划分而成的。牙叶：牙冠主要分区之一，为钙化中心

list.abs: 枕叶（occipital lobe）（Occipital Lobe）是大脑皮层的一个区域。其已知的主要功能包括处理视觉信息，例如初级视皮层V1就位于枕叶（occipital lobe）。
额叶额叶(Frontal Lobe) 额叶额叶：是大脑发育中最高级的部分,它包括初级运动区、前运动区和前额叶。位于中央沟以前。
顶叶（Parietal lobe）是大脑的一部份，位在额叶、枕叶和颞叶之间，而其与额叶的分界线为中央沟，另外顶枕沟为顶叶和枕叶的分界 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via late Latin from Greek lobos 'lobe, pod'

entry.def: The lobe of your ear  is the soft, fleshy part at the bottom.
A lobe is a rounded part of something, for example one of the sections of your brain or lungs, or one of the rounded sections along the edges of some leaves.

example.ex: ...damage to the temporal lobe of the brain.

means.word_mean: 1. (anatomy) a somewhat rounded subdivision of a bodily organ or part;
2. (botany) a part into which a leaf is divided
3. the enhanced response of an antenna in a given direction as indicated by a loop in its radiation pattern
4. a rounded projection that is part of a larger structure
